entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
